original_text: O ye children of Benjamin, gather yourselves to flee out of the midst of Jerusalem, and blow the trumpet in Tekoa, and set up a sign of fire in Bethhaccerem: for evil appeareth out of the north, and great destruction.
korean_text: 베냐민 자손들아 예루살렘 가운데로부터 피난하라 드고아에서 나팔을 불고 벧학게렘에서 깃발을 들라 재앙과 큰 파멸이 북방에서 엿보아 옴이니라

sentences.original_text: gather yourselves to flee out of the midst of Jerusalem
and blow the trumpet in Tekoa
and set up a sign of fire in Bethhaccerem
for evil appeareth out of the north
